kick.no-mention: No user mention found. Please @ the user you want to kick!

ban.no-mention: No user mention found. Please @ the user you want to kick!

unban.no-matches: No ban records found with the username $1
unban.no-matches-with-discriminator: No ban records found with the username $1 and discriminator $2
unban.multiple-matches:
Multiple matches detected! Please, pick one with the discriminator (#1234).

prefix.missing-permissions: you do not have the `administrator` permission needed to use this command!
prefix.no-prefixes: there are no custom prefixes for this guild!
prefix.list-prefixes: these are the custom prefixes for this guild: $1
prefix.no-prefix-add: please provide a prefix to add!
prefix.no-prefix-remove: please provide a prefix to remove!
prefix.prefix-already-in-use: the prefix is already being used!
prefix.no-prefix-found: the prefix is not being used!
prefix.prefix-added: `$1` prefix has been successfully added for this guild!
prefix.prefix-removed: `$1` prefix has been successfully removed from this guild!

prune.lonely: there are no users to prune!
prune.blocked: Cannot request for confirmation while another command is awaiting a response. Cancel it and try again!
prune.prompt: This will kick $1 people! Type `confirm` if you're you want to proceed, or `cancel` to quit.
prune.timed-out: The server prune has been automatically cancelled after 30 seconds. Use the command again to try again.

purge.usage: usage: [Number: messages to delete (required)] [Mention or Name#Identifier: from user]
purge.no-messages: No results found for your query. Try double-checking your user username and discriminator.
purge.blocked: Cannot request for confirmation while another command is awaiting a response. Cancel it and try again!
purge.prompt: This will delete $1 ($1|message|messages) by $2 ($2|user|users). THIS ACTION IS IRREVERSIBLE. Type `confirm` if you want to proceed, or `cancel` to quit.
purge.timed-out: The bulk deletion has been automatically cancelled after 30 seconds. Use the command again to try again.

akinator.session-closed: Your akinator session has been closed!
akinator.no-session-open: You have no sessions online! Begin playing with `akinator start`.
akinator.session-open: You already have a session open! Finish it or close the game with `akinator close`.

akinator.unexpected-code: Server returned an unexpected status code `$1`.
akinator.blocked: Cannot start a game due to another command expecting a response. Cancel it and try again!
